title: The Peace Tree Juice Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, International, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The Peace Tree Cafe offers fresh, local and organic foods, including smoothies and fresh vegetable and fruit juices. Staff knowledgeable about vegan options, of which there are several. Tofu is a substitute for meat dishes. Soy, almond, hemp and coconut milks are available. Gluten-free bread is offered. Vegans, try the red quinoa stuffed portobello mushroom with seasonal vegetables and ask for no goat cheese.
